features: Expand all-around to custom-fit your shape perfectly.
Create less waste than any other tampon on the market since there's no bulky applicator to throw away.
FluidLock grooves for locked-in protection you can trust.
Designed by a woman gynecologist to custom fit your shape perfectly.
So small that you can carry them anywhere-your tiniest purse or pocket…or even the palm of your hand.
body.description: o.b. tampons are more compact than other tampons with comparable absorbency, making them easier to insert. New o.b. ProComfort tampons are even easier to insert and remove because they are the only tampons with a SilkTouch cover for ultimate comfort. Super, 40 count.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: o.b. Pro-Comfort Non-Applicator Tampons, Super Absorbancy Try o.b. PRO COMFORT Super tampons with Fluid-Lock grooves for locked-in leak protection. The only one with SilkTouch cover for ultimate comfort and protection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Didn't have to go to the store
reviews.reviewText: Good price and right to your door.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: As a 45 yr old female who has bad womenly issues, this tampon is unbeatable. I've tried them all. From the most expensive to the highest rated. OB still blows them all out of the water. No leaks, comfortable, absorbent, and for women in middle age, easy to deal with the delicacy needed during your monthly, without being graphic in my description. Especially for women close to pre menopause. Can't deal without this particular brand. Tampons get almost impossible at this stage in life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best of the best of the best
reviews.reviewText: God bless my mother who introduced me to o.b. tampons when that lovely first visit from Aunt Flo occurred...and 16 years later, I still haven't found a tampon that compares. In school, other girls would scoff at the "grossness" of this non-applicator tampon that you had to insert yourself...how dare you actually TOUCH your own body - much better to use a big plastic wand to do that job (so 1930's) that then needs to be somehow put back in the packaging and thrown away discreetly (because ew - who wants to see a USED applicator). Not with OB...tiny plastic wrapper that can be wadded up into your pocket until convenient to dispose without a second thought is the only baggage it brings to the table. Not to mention you can fit one in your pocket almost completely unnoticed - yay! Think of all of the garbage this world would be spared if women would move away from feeling like they NEED applicators. Honestly, once you get over the initial change of getting it in, you'll love it! I never, EVER leak from bad placement with o.b. and can't say the same from other tampons that I've used in a pinch. And it never feels like someone is taking a battering ram to your cervix - you know, when you think your have your applicator in the right spot but were very wrong as soon as you send the missile out. Really, I can't say enough good things about these tampons so get over your insecurities because who has time for that anyway.As far as "FluidLock" vs "Silk Touch"...I hadn't seen the Silk Touch ones until the last 5 years or so and used the FluidLock until that time...but now that I've tried both, I HAVE to get the Silk Touch ones because they're just so much more comfortable coming in and going out. Works just as well too, but definitely harder to find (which is why I'm buying them on Amazon). The ultra-thin wrapping around the tampon keeps it from snagging/dragging/etc going it and it's never a tug-of-war battle when it's time to switch out. Pretty much the best invention ever and I can't imagine why they don't just switch all of them over to this style. Also, the "regulars" are usually good enough for me, but the supers are crazy absorbent when you need that extra protection. I'm super active - run, bike, swim, chase three wild children - and I don't ever have to think about these bad boys moving out of place or bailing on me. Did I mention they are super short too? It's amazing what this little powerhouse can hold versus some of the others I've had the unfortunate experience of using that are literally 3x longer (like holy-crap-I-feel-like-a-clown-pulling-out-endless-scarves, how-long-can-this-thing-be kind of long).Do yourself a favor and try these out. You won't look back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Always loved these
reviews.reviewText: Had been on depoprovera for 12 years and didn’t have periods. Went back to my known and loved tamps and am still happy with them

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I jsut can't recommend a better product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Tampons that have minimum plastic and are super smooth
reviews.reviewText: o.b. tampons have minimum plastic and are very easy to use with the smooth coating on the surface. Subtract one star because I have used the German version whose individual packaging is much easier to open by a simple twist. The individual packaging of this version is definitely harder, but still doable at this size. It is almost impossible to open for the smallest size, where the twist-open mechanism is much more convenient. I wish Amazon would import the German version at some point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have been using these since high school and they've never failed me. The silk touch is hard to find in stores so I have to stock up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The tampon is much environment friendly compere to the plastic ones. But it does require some experience and skills of comfortably placing it in the position. I love how small it is but how much it can hold otherwise.

More eco-friendly version than that with plastic applicator. Tried this silk version for the first time and it easy to insert although not as plastic applicator but good enough. Don’t use disposable products that often as a menstrual cup user, but this is a nice add besides the cup
The best brand in tampons without a doubt.

One of the only feminine products that works well for me. I have to have the Silk Touch though and they have been difficult to find in the stores for some reason. I will have to stock up on more before they are gone here too! Thank you for having these and actually shipping the ones that it says they are!!!!!

It took me years to find these. I highly recommend these tampons for anyone who has found other ones too bulky and uncomfortable.I wanted something smaller that has less plastic waste and that is easier to use. Using these is easier than it sounds. (No applicator,Just follow the directions) They are tiny and wrapped individually in thinner plastic. They expand exponentially as they fill up, and are surprisingly absorbent. They don’t hurt to remove since the weight gradually increases and makes them naturally slide ‘downhill’ when very full so you know when it needs changing.I have found no leaks from this tampon so far. (They will fill up faster on a heavy day)For heavier days, probably the larger size should be selected, but I have not tried those yet.The first tampon that I have felt comfortable wearing after looking for 25 years.
love this product, just wish they weren't so difficult to find
